data.text:
@sagovau @SAPoliceNews @SAHealth Why masks still? why can't unvaxxed enter certain venues still?

C'mon remove these ridiculous restrictions, they are not necessary at all, never were.

@sagovau @SAPoliceNews @SAHealth So just so I understand,  SA has 2590 covid yesterday and yet on medical advice in 2021 you shut a border with Zero case ? "SA, reintroduce strict border restrictions with Melbourne in a matter of hours as a cluster linked to the Melbourne Holiday Inn hotel grew to eight."
@sagovau @SAPoliceNews @SAHealth Weak leadership. Weak people. Weak restrictions. Still have to wear a mask when dancing. Clayton’s Government.

@sagovau @marshall_steven @SAPoliceNews @SAHealth So if #covid19 is the reason why I can’t go to an event why isn’t it a reason when and if I have to get my money back. Lift the mandates for everyone.

@Sophs0123 @sagovau @marshall_steven @SAPoliceNews @SAHealth How deadly is it? If you are a healthy person? The 💉 is destroying more lives than the virus it's self. There is no science to the mandates & lockdowns! The scientific evidence that all this has been based on has been requested. They are refusing to hand it over..
@sagovau @SAPoliceNews @SAHealth END THE SOE & all mandates now! Rehire all sacked workers discriminated against!!
@samantha4bs @sagovau @marshall_steven @SAPoliceNews @SAHealth Their fu%king scum and still masking us there is no state of emergency they are criminals

@Sophs0123 @sagovau @marshall_steven @SAPoliceNews @SAHealth The responsibility of gov is not to protect you. That‘s solely yours. Gov has to provide a suitable health infrastructure though, which is given.
@sagovau @SAPoliceNews @SAHealth Stop all restrictions and mandates. Now! There is no valid reason for taking away rights.
